article:
A king cobra is an ugly-looking snake at any time.But when he is  _  and is crawling through the grass  _  your face,your hatred becomes terrific .
Shells from the enemy's guns were bursting around us.I was  _  flat behind a big rock.The snake,too,was looking for a safe place.When he saw the rock,he  _  straight for it,and me.I didn't move,  _  he would pass by.
He didn't.
The cobra's head was  _  two feet of my face when he saw me.He  _  back a little,then lifted his head,  _  to strike... 
The ride was long and hard.Riding over rough roads hurt my leg  _  .But it has been over an hour since the cobra struck,and I was still  _  .And life was sweet...
When we reached the field hospital,they  _  me into the operating room,  _  several cuts in my leg,and gave me some dope .From their  _  ,I could tell they were getting ready to cut off my leg.I begged them not to.
"Sir,"I said to the oldest doctor,"I made up my mind  _  I was going to die,I would rather die than be sent home  _  pieces."
He was a pretty good man.He smiled and said they wouldn't take it off.
They did everything they could do for me.For sixty days my leg  _  rotted off.But eight months later I walked ashored at San Francisco.You  _  never know how good it was.  _  
they gave me the Hurple Heart .I laughed when the man  _  it on me.I told him that I wasn't wounded.I was  _  .
